preqs: + Master of Clinical Pharmacy students must have completed 60 credit points.+ Master of Pharmacy Practice students must have completed 36 credit points.

rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {3467, P6002}
For COURSE_CODE IN {P6002} Do Must have passed 60 credit points Otherwise Must have passed 36 credit points

description: This capstone unit will be one of the final units completed in the Masters program. It will build on learnings from all units undertaken in the Masters program, in particular the ability to reflect on practice, formulate questions identifying knowledge gaps, analyse available evidence. It will require the student to utilise the Australian Advanced Pharmacy Practice Framework (APPF) to reflect on their level of performance and identify means to further advance their practice.
faculty: Faculty of Pharmacy and Pharmaceutical Sciences
